properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 5 at 9:41PM CST until February 8 at 12:48PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331
Highway Bridge...

.Additional heavy rainfall across the Catoma Creek basin, added to
the rain that has already fallen, will continue to lead to
significant rises. A Flood Warning remains in effect for Catoma
Creek at trhe U.S. Highway 331 Bridge.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Catoma Creek Near The U.S. 331 Highway Bridge.
* from Thursday afternoon to Saturday afternoon...or until the
Warning is cancelled.
* AT  9:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 5.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow afternoon  and
continue to rise to near 22.1 feet by Friday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 20.0 feet...Flooding of agricultural lands in the
vicinity of the U.S. 331 Highway Bridge occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
